discussion.content:
on exam Feb2020
Atention. On exam only 1 answer, not 2!!!!
I answered D, but I'm not sure if this is exactly correct.

choices.D: A SNMP Group containing the SNMP managers
choices.B: A standard ACL containing the SNMP managers applied to the SNMP configuration
choices.A: Routing Filter with the SNMP managers in it applied outbound
choices.C: A SNMP View containing the SNMP managers

questions.question_text:
You have just deployed SNMPv3 in your environment. Your manager asks you to make sure that your SNMP agents can only talk to the SNMP Manager.
What would you configure on your SNMP agents to satisfy this request?
Which next-generation encryption algorithm supports four variants?

choices.A: using switchport mode access command on all host ports
choices.F: using switchport nonegotiate command on dynamic desirable ports
choices.B: enabling BPDU guard on all access ports
choices.C: creating VLAN 99 and using switchport trunk native vlan 99 command on trunk ports
choices.E: using switchport trunk native vlan 10 command on trunk ports

questions.question_text: Which two configurations can prevent VLAN hopping attack from attackers at VLAN 10? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: the most important is vlan 99 is NOT be used anywhere in the network.
I think that the exact answers are AF . I have a doubt on answer F because it say dynamic desirable ports

questions.question_text: What aims to remove the ability to deny an action?

discussion.content:
Option A is OK --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K8KykDQxQf8. 
Be Careful, The configuration in SDN is different as the configuration in ASDM

None of these options look exactly right but heres the offical how to from Cisco. Make of it what you will.
Step 1. Log in to ASDM and navigate to Configuration > Device Management > Users/AAA > AAA Access > Authentication.
Step 2. Select the Enable check box under the Require Authentication to Allow Use of Privilege Mode Commands
http://www.ciscopress.com/articles/article.asp?p=1552963&seqNum=3

questions.question_text: Which path do you follow to enable AAA though the SDM?
